humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that there are 11 lymph nodes examined, and metastatic carcinoma is found in 2 of those lymph nodes. This corresponds to the N1 stage based on the AJCC staging system, as stated in New Rule 12: N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes (No/Total).

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic carcinoma involving two of eleven lymph nodes, with the largest tumor deposit being 14.5 mm. This corresponds to a pathologic N1a stage.
